item.title: Abandoned vehicle, 6th February
item.description:
This car has been parked in our private driveway since early last year tires are flat it’s not moved It’s now untaxed and without a MOT it has been reported to police who have explained it’s not stolen so cannot do anything Has been reported to Bromley who stated cannot do anything as it had road tax No body in this block of flats has expressed it is there car and it’s taking up space I’ve tried to report on DVLA and it’s brought me back to Bromley website.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Melbourne Court, Crystal Palace, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bus stop closed, 6th February
item.description:

item.title: Road needs resurfacing, 6th February
item.description:
The edge of the road by the bus stop has degraded massively and there are huge puddles. The pavement is a mess from the splashing and stones flicking up when the bus pulls in. Please relay ASAP. It’s been like this for months.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Baring Road, Chinbrook, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead adult fox near Woolwich Road flyover, 6th February
item.description:
